Errors handling

Constants and functions to catch/identify an error. More...

Enumerations

enum  ErrorID { SUCCESS, ETERM_WRONGID, ETERM_UNAVAIL }

Variables

int errno
 Error number identifier.

Detailed Description

Constants and functions to catch/identify an error.

A function can modify the value of errno in the event of an error to indicate what went wrong.

Enumeration Type Documentation

enum ErrorID

Error identifier constants.

These are the values that errno variable can take in order to identify an error.

Enumerator:
SUCCESS  No errors.

ETERM_WRONGID  Terminal ID isn't valid.

ETERM_UNAVAIL  Terminal isn't available.
